sense.def:
A copy
je nekaj, kar je narejeno tako, da je podobno nečemu drugemu.

seg.quote: I will send you a copy of the letter.

sense.def:
To copy something
pomeni nekaj znova zapisati.

seg.quote: ...a comment she had copied from his notes.

sense.def:
To copy a person or someone's ideas
pomeni vesti se tako kot nekdo drug ali uporabljati zamisli nekoga drugega.

seg.quote: Our scheme has been copied by other universities.

sense.def:
A copy of a book, newspaper, or record
je ena od več enakih knjig, časopisov ali plošč.

seg.quote: Sixty thousand copies of the record were sold.

sense.def:
To copy down
nekaj, kar nekdo reče ali napiše, pomeni, da tisto sami zapišemo.

seg.quote: I shouldn't bother to copy these figures down.

sense.def:
To copy out
pomeni v celoti zapisati dolgo besedilo.

seg.quote: I remember copying out the whole play.
